name: Jeanne d'Arc (itch)
description:
Jeanne d'Arc is a  Visual Novel for Windows made with Novelty*. 

Rouen, 1431. Joan of Arc has been arrested and is waiting her judgement in a trial for witchcraft. Play along her and see her last days as she awaits the judgement of the bishop Pierre Cauchon. The game lasts 15-20 minutes to complete. There are multiple endings.

Game Designers: Adrien Bariau, Florian Piette, Rémy Tavernier, Bruce Williams

Game Artists: Julien Deswarte, Thomas Goubier, Charly Kokx, Matéo Rosa, Nicolas Ruffin, Damien Touttee

Sound Design: Aurélien Ugen

*Novelty is unsupported since 2010, it may not work on all computers.
